A printer that uses AI to automatically print out personalized greeting cards and invitations. The AI could learn from the user's past printing history to suggest designs and messages that match their style.
A printer that can print in 3D. The user could upload their own 3D models and have them printed out in physical form.
A printer that uses edible ink to print out food and beverages. The user could print out custom designs on edible paper or plastic to use as food wrappers or decorations.
A printer that uses bioprinting technology to print out living organisms. The user could print out living cells or tissues to use for medical research or regenerative medicine.

A printer that uses solar energy to print out documents. The user could place their printer in a sunny location and it would generate its own power to print out documents without the need for electricity.
